name: An Important Delivery
description:
This game was created for Summer #ue4jam 2019. The theme was "Make It Count".

Play as a delivery Ostrich, busy with their job, trying to make enough to buy new shoes. Make sure you deliver everything on time! Or, you know, don't. Climb on top of the tallest building, stop to talk to a friendly stranger, look at the clouds floating above... It's your decision.

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • E to interact

Team:

Dito Seregin
Alina Israfilova

Third-party assets:

Rooftop city ambiance by risto_alcinov

Pop sound by greenvwbeetle
